sys_ui_page.description: UI Page to administrate 'DevOps+' admin role It is used to directly assign devops_admin role directly to users - while direct role assignment is usually not desired, because of the scoped administration design of the app.
sys_ui_page.html:
const selectedUsers = (function () { const userRoleGr = new GlideRecordSecure('sys_user_has_role'); userRoleGr.addQuery('role.name', 'x_424426_devops.devops_admin'); userRoleGr.addQuery('inherited', false); userRoleGr.query(); const devOpsUsers = []; while (userRoleGr.next()) { let label = userRoleGr.getDisplayValue('user'); if (!userRoleGr.user.active) { label += ' (inactive)'; } devOpsUsers.push({ value: userRoleGr.getValue('user'), label: label }); } return devOpsUsers; })(); const selectableUsers = (function (selectedUsers) { const userRoleGr = new GlideRecordSecure('sys_user_has_role'); userRoleGr.addQuery('user', 'NOT IN', selectedUsers.map(u => u.value)); userRoleGr.addQuery('user.active', true); userRoleGr.addQuery('role.name', 'admin'); userRoleGr.query(); const adminUsers = []; while (userRoleGr.next()) { const label = userRoleGr.getDisplayValue('user'); if (label) { adminUsers.push({ value: userRoleGr.getValue('user'), label: label }); } } return adminUsers; })(selectedUsers); const inheritedAdminRoleSysID = (function () { const userRoleGr = new GlideRecordSecure('sys_user_role_contains'); userRoleGr.addQuery('role.name', 'admin'); userRoleGr.addQuery('contains.name', 'x_424426_devops.devops_admin'); userRoleGr.setLimit(1); userRoleGr.query(); if (userRoleGr.next()) { return userRoleGr.getUniqueValue(); } })();

Select users who should be assigned to the 'DevOps+ Admin' role

Note:$[SP]The DevOps+ Admin role is currently inherited by the admin role.

It is recommended to directly assign the DevOps+ Admin role to your platform super admins and remove this inheritance.
